meanings.definition: A hockey player who specializes in defending against opposing players.
meanings.sent1: The defensemen on the team work hard to protect their goal.
meanings.sent2: The defensemen blocked the opponent's shots with skill and determination.
meanings.sent3: The defensemen decided to have a pizza party to celebrate their strong defense on the ice.
meanings.sent4: The defensemen were like a wall, impenetrable and steadfast in their protection.
meanings.sent5: The defensemen stood tall, ready to face any challenge that came their way.

meanings.definition: A person who defends or protects something.
meanings.sent1: The defensemen of the castle stood guard day and night.
meanings.sent2: She was a fearless defensewoman, always ready to protect her friends.
meanings.sent3: The defenseman of the cookies was the cookie jar, keeping them safe from hungry siblings.
meanings.sent4: He was a loyal defenseman of the forest, ensuring no harm came to its inhabitants.
meanings.sent5: The defenseman of the treasure chest kept a close watch to prevent any theft.
